= Introduction =

A step by step guide to compiling & installing PHP with the ax_gameserver_query extension.


= Step by step =

  # Goto your php source folder and open the "ext" folder.
  # Create a new folder called "ax_gameserver_query".
  # Copy all the files from the projects trunk into the folder.
  # Go back to the php source folder.
  # Run "./buildconf --force".
  # Once thats finished run "./configure --enable-ax_gameserver_query" (remeber to add any aditional switches for other extensions that you require).
  # Now run the "make" command followed by the "make install" command to compile then install php.
  # Now you done.
